Examples

Example 1: Complete view

Adds a favourite icon, the favourite list and the history list to the page.


<div id="favourites_example1" swa="Favourites"></div>

Example 2: Show only fav icon

Set only the showFavIcon option for only display the fav icon.


window["favourites_example2_options"] = {
    showFavIcon: true,
    showFavList: false,
    showHistList: false
};
